EmailTemplate.name: WM Zonal Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Do or Don't? Your call...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
There are some interesting opportunities for you below.
If you like them, do them! If you don't like them....well probably don't do them
Media Team Launch Places left
There are a handful of places left on our Media Teams. Ideally you would be able to attend the launch on 7th March in Birmingham, but you can still take part if not.
Sign up here...https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1IJtXYOK5bgLnKEmzhJ_WF5l4-bSy8etF2YzTafGVXSU/viewform?usp=send_form Live in The Black Country?
We are planning to host a Big Sleepout at the Black Country Museum on 11th April.
Hold your horses...you don't have to do anything yet...just watch this space and we will be in touch. Live in or near Birmingham?
Want to help out at a cool event? Or got a friend or parent working professionally who could benefit from linking up with others
Be part of an event run by The Challenge, bringing together charities bringing together some high profiile charities and businesses and engaging young people.
It will start at 8am on Thursday 12th March in Sutton Coldfield.
If you would like to support this or for more info email tom.haigh@the-challenge.org by 7th March.
